translation.en: ♪ How, what, where, why? ♪
♪ What, where, why? How, what, where, why? ♪
translation.fr: Comment, quoi, où, pourquoi ? Comment, quoi, où, pourquoi ?

translation.en: ♪ What, where, why? Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.fr: Comment, quoi, où, pourquoi ? Ada Twist, la scientifique

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What the answer is ♪
♪ Under here, over there ♪
♪ Science is everywhere you look ♪
♪ With Iggy Peck, architect ♪
♪ And Rosie Revere, engineer ♪
♪ So much to do ♪
♪ And you can help too! ♪
♪ A mystery, a riddle A puzzle, or a quest ♪
♪ There are wonders to discover And hypotheses to test ♪
♪ Science is the best! Ada Twist, scientist ♪
translation.fr: C'est super ! Ada Twist, la scientifique

translation.en: ♪ She's gonna find out What thе answer is ♪
♪ Everywherе science is She's forming a hypothesis ♪
translation.fr:
Pour chaque question
Elle formule des hypothèses

translation.en: ♪ Connecting polka dots 'Cause this is scientist, Ada Twist! ♪
translation.fr:
Elle relie les petits points
Ada Twist ! ADA TWIST, LA SCIENTIFIQUE

translation.en: Ladybug's got eyes on the new neighbors' house.
translation.fr:
J'ai la maison
des nouveaux voisins en vue.

translation.en: A turntable? So, they like music.
translation.fr: Une platine ? Ils aiment la musique.

translation.en: Dragon, Whale Shark, any intel? Over.
[squeals] I think your new neighbors are unicorns! -Over. -[Iggy] Huh?
translation.fr:
Je crois
que ce sont des licornes. À vous.

translation.en: Ah! Their evil bot dog's trying to take over the world! Over.
translation.fr: Leur chien robot est diabolique ! À vous.

translation.en: Gotcha! Iggy, what's up? You're scooting like you've seen a ghost.
translation.fr:
Qu'y a-t-il ?
On dirait que tu as vu un fantôme.

translation.en: Not at ghost, a p-p-p-puppy!
A puppy? Kids…
C'mon, crew. Let's go say hi to the new neighbors.
We're bringing my famous peppermint cookies to welcome them to the neighborhood.
translation.fr:
J'ai fait des cookies
pour leur souhaiter la bienvenue.

translation.en: -That's okay, I'll stay here. -What about our investigation?
translation.fr:
- Je vais rester ici.
- Et notre enquête ?

translation.en: Don't you wanna know if they are evil unicorn bots who love music?
translation.fr:
Tu ne veux pas savoir
si ce sont des licornes ?

translation.en: Fine, I'll come. For science.
translation.fr: D'accord. Je viens. Pour la science.

translation.en: -[barking] -[Iggy] Oh, no!
-[Rosie] Watch out! -[Arthur yells]
-Come on, boo. -I gotcha, buddy.
Sorry I doubted you, Iggy. That puppy is fierce!
translation.fr:
Tu avais raison, Iggy.
Ce chiot est féroce.

translation.en: -It's okay. -[boy] Calypso!
-Heel mode, activate. -[watch beeps]
Sorry about that. He's usually friendly.
-There must be a glitch in his code. -[man] Don't worry, he doesn't bite.
translation.fr:
- Il doit y avoir un bug.
- Il ne mord pas.

translation.en: -Unless my son programmed him to. -[kids giggle]
How you doing? I'm Beck.
-This is Benny and Bee-Bee. -Hello.
We're the Twists. Aisha, Amari, Ada and Arthur.
translation.fr: Aisha, Amari, Ada et Arthur Twist.

translation.en: And this is Iggy and Rosie.
-Hey. -Hey, how you doing?
Miss Sugarpie loves cookies!
[chuckles] Well, good thing we have some right here.
translation.fr: Alors, on a bien fait d'en apporter.

translation.en: -Welcome to the neighborhood. -Thank you!
Bee-Bee, do we shake down our guests for cookies?
No, Glammy.
You can't knock the hustle, though, right?
translation.fr: Mais il faut louer l'effort, non ?

translation.en: -[laughing] -You know that's right.
I'm Grandma, or as I prefer, Glam-Ma.
translation.fr: Je suis mamie, mais je préfère Glamy.

translation.en: Come, sit, tell me everything about this lovely town.
translation.fr:
Venez. Racontez-moi tout
sur cette ville charmante.

translation.en: -[alarm beeps] -[yelps] Oh, man! Really?!
-Gotta fix that code! -[calypso barking]
Wait for me! -Whoa! [sighs] -[barking]
[sighs] Okay, I fixed the code.
Calypso, sit. Stay… Good bot.
translation.fr: Calypso, assis. Pas bouger. Bon robot.

translation.en: -He's cute, right? -[giggles] -Benny made him. -Yep.
translation.fr:
- Benny l'a fabriqué.
- Avec des matériaux recyclés.

translation.en: -From recycled materials. -Fab!
translation.fr:
- Benny l'a fabriqué.
- Avec des matériaux recyclés. - Super.
- Bien.

translation.en: -Wow! -Love that!
It's cool, right? I was born without a hand, but I get to have this awesome one!
translation.fr:
Je suis née avec une seule main,
mais j'ai eu celle-ci.

translation.en: Miss Sugarpie picked the color.
-Awesome! -Amazing!
Ooh!
Nice turntable. My dad has one.
translation.fr: Mon père a aussi une platine.

translation.en: -Is this a control panel? -Ooh! For a spaceship?
-That's Benny's DJ controller. -DJ?
translation.fr:
- Benny est un DJ.
- Un DJ ?

translation.en: Dance party! Come on!
translation.fr:
- Benny est un DJ.
- Un DJ ? Musique ! Allez !

translation.en: Thanks. Maybe… uh… another time?
[giggles] Comet Quest? Best TV show on the planet!
translation.fr:
La Quête des Comètes ?
J'adore cette série.

translation.en: Doctor Galactic is a boss!
"We don't rest until we quest!"
[gasps] I have an idea. You should watch it with us this weekend, Benny.
translation.fr:
On pourrait regarder
le prochain épisode ensemble.

translation.en: -Um… I don't know. -[Arthur] Who's this?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. C'est qui ?

translation.en: Anyone ever tell you guys? You're really nosy.
-More like curious. -Totally.
That's my cousin, Dre. Watching Comet Quest is our thing.
translation.fr:
C'est mon cousin, Dre.
Il adore la série.

translation.en: 'Til we moved here.
translation.fr:
C'était notre truc.
Avant qu'on déménage ici.

translation.en: I have an observation. I think you're homesick.
translation.fr:
Je crois que tu es nostalgique
de ta maison.

translation.en: I do miss home a lot. But we're not going back.
translation.fr:
Elle me manque.
Mais on n'y retournera pas.

translation.en: Maybe we can help. We're scientists.
translation.fr: On va t'aider. On est des scientifiques.

translation.en: -Yeah. -We figure stuff out.
Kids. Your dads are having a debate about which instrument is the funkiest.
translation.fr:
Les papas discutent
de l'instrument le plus cool.

translation.en: They'll be a while. You coming home with me?
Can Benny come home and brainstorm with us?
If it's okay with his dad, sure.
-Bee-Bee, sweetie, your Glammy wants you. -Okay. Bye!
translation.fr: Bee-Bee, va voir ta Glamy. D'accord. Salut !

translation.en: -Later! -Bye!
Come on, man, the bass is the backbone.
Let's brainstorm about how to get Benny back home.
translation.fr: On va devoir se remuer les méninges.

translation.en: Say what?
♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
♪ Throw in every thought you've had No idea is ever bad ♪
translation.fr:
Partage tes pensées
Donne tes idées

translation.en: -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪ -♪ Gather up your friends, try ♪
translation.fr:
Remue-méninges Réunis tes amis
Trouve les réponses

translation.en: -♪ To find the how ♪ -♪ The what ♪
translation.fr:
Réunis tes amis
Trouve les réponses

translation.en: -♪ The why ♪ -♪ Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
♪ Let our imaginations Become great new creations ♪
translation.fr:
Laissons nos imaginations
Devenir de nouvelles créations

translation.en: ♪ When we brainstorm, brainstorm! Brainstorm, brainstorm! ♪
translation.fr: Quand on se remue les méninges !

translation.en: We could hook Benny up to a jetpack. He'd get home in no time.
translation.fr:
Benny pourrait rentrer chez lui
grâce à un propulseur.

translation.en: But I think they take a lot of practice to control.
translation.fr:
Il faut de l'entraînement
pour le contrôler.

translation.en: What if we made the fastest underground train to take you super fast?
translation.fr:
Si on fabriquait
le métro le plus rapide du monde ?

translation.en: -[Ada] Let's go! -[Benny] Whoa!
The permits we'd have to get to tunnel through all the gopher cities down there? Ugh!
translation.fr:
Mais on aura besoin
de permis pour creuser.

translation.en: Nightmare!
-Right. Who wants to deal with that? -Ooh! An idea's downloading.
translation.fr: C'est vrai. Évitons ça. J'ai une idée.

translation.en: What if we make a bot that can run as fast as the fastest man alive?
translation.fr:
Si on fabriquait un robot
capable de courir super vite ?

translation.en: He can take me home and get me back here before my family misses me.
translation.fr:
Il m'emmènerait et me ramènerait
en un rien de temps.

translation.en: That would be freaky, and amazing! But what if the bot won't stop?
translation.fr: Ce serait super cool ! Mais s'il ne s'arrêtait jamais ?

translation.en: Yeah, that would be insane in the mainframe.
Ugh! I wish I could just snap my fingers and beam you home like Doctor Galactic would.
translation.fr:
J'aimerais pouvoir te renvoyer chez toi
comme le Dr Galactique.

translation.en: That's it! I'll make a teleportation device like Doctor Galactic's in Comet Quest!
translation.fr:
C'est ça ! Il me faut un téléporteur
comme dans la série.

translation.en: -That would be space-tastic! -I don't know.
translation.fr: Ce serait fantastique ! Mais ça n'a pas encore été développé.

translation.en: Scientists haven't figured out teleportation yet.
translation.fr: Mais ça n'a pas encore été développé.

translation.en: Isn't that more like science fiction than actual science?
Lots of things were sci-fi before they were science.
Cell phones, space stations, -robot puppies. -[barking]
translation.fr:
Les portables,
les bases spatiales, les chiens robots.

translation.en: -You're right. -True.
If you wanna change stuff, you gotta think big!
translation.fr: Il faut voir les choses en grand.

translation.en: And I have to try, or I'm never going home again.
translation.fr:
Je dois essayer
si je veux rentrer chez moi.

translation.en: You're right. Scientists try impossible stuff all the time.
translation.fr:
Tu as raison.
C'est ce que font les scientifiques.

translation.en: -They do. -Yeah.
Okay. My gears are turning. Since Comet Quest is my jam,
translation.fr:
Bon. C'est parti. J'ai déjà fait beaucoup de recherches
sur la téléportation.

translation.en: I've done a lot of research on teleportation.
translation.fr:
J'ai déjà fait beaucoup de recherches
sur la téléportation.

translation.en: I think I know how to do it.
You have a hypothesis? A hypothe-what now?
translation.fr:
- Tu as une hypothèse ?
- Une quoi ?

translation.en: -[laughing] -♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
-♪ Does that… ♪ -♪ Observation ♪
-♪ Mean this… ♪ - ♪Explanation? ♪
♪ Right or wrong Let's find out what the answer is ♪
translation.fr:
Vrai ou faux
Trouvons la réponse

translation.en: ♪ It might not be right But we're gonna find out ♪
translation.fr: Si ce n'est pas ça, on le saura

translation.en: ♪ What this theory is all about ♪
♪ An educated guess ♪
-♪ Will it stand up to our test? ♪ -♪ That's what a hypothesis is ♪
translation.fr:
- La supposition
- Sera testée C'est ça, une hypothèse

translation.en: ♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
♪ I've got a hypothesis ♪
♪ Let's find out how right it is ♪
♪ Let's go! ♪
To teleport, you have to travel faster than the speed of light.
translation.fr:
Pour réussir,
il faut aller plus vite que lumière.

translation.en: So, my hypothesis is, if I can do that,
translation.fr:
Pour réussir,
il faut aller plus vite que lumière. Si j'y parviens,
je pourrai me téléporter chez moi.

translation.en: I can beam myself home.
translation.fr:
Si j'y parviens,
je pourrai me téléporter chez moi.

translation.en: But no one's traveled faster than the speed of light.
translation.fr:
Personne n'est allé
plus vite que la lumière.

translation.en: Yet. But maybe we could if we made a Beaming Booth, like Doctor Galactic's teleportation machine.
translation.fr:
Pour l'instant. Mais on pourrait y arriver
en imitant le Dr Galactique.

translation.en: -That's true. -Let's do it!
Loading the lab…
This is bomb-dot-com! Hold the smartphone!
translation.fr:
Ça, c'est de la balle ! Une machine à pince ?
Un simulateur de conduite ?

translation.en: You have a claw machine? And a driving simulation machine? And…
translation.fr:
Une machine à pince ?
Un simulateur de conduite ? Et une soufflerie ?

translation.en: [voice echos] …and a wind tunnel?!
-[laughing] -Now I'm being really nosy.
You're gonna fit right in, Benny.
Especially with this.
Wow! This looks like it was made just for me. Aw! Thank you.
translation.fr: Ça a été fait pour moi. Merci.

translation.en: You're welcome. Now, let's get to work.
-I could design the Beaming Booth. -And I could build it.
translation.fr:
- Je gère la conception.
- Je fabrique.

translation.en: Only problem is, Doctor Galactic used supplies from seven different planets.
translation.fr:
Mais le Dr Galactique a utilisé
des matériaux de plusieurs planètes.

translation.en: Since we have to stay on Earth, we can see what's in my garage.
translation.fr:
Comme on est ici,
allons voir dans mon garage.

translation.en: -[kids giggle] -But the keys add the magic.
The bass keeps your feet tapping.
Ta-da!
I programmed it using the speed of the world's fastest animals.
translation.fr:
J'ai pris les vitesses
d'animaux très rapides.

translation.en: The peregrine falcon, cheetah, and black marlin.
With all that speed, this is definitely gonna work.
Thanks for helping me, guys. I'm going home to see Dre. Benny B. out!
translation.fr:
Merci, les amis.
Je vais rentrer voir Dre. Allez !

translation.en: Wait. We should test it first to make sure it's safe.
Oh, yeah, you're right. Benny B. in.
I guess I could sacrifice my egg salad sandwich… for science.
translation.fr:
Je veux bien sacrifier
mon sandwich pour la science.

translation.en: That'll work.
Hit it, Benny!
-[Benny] It worked! -Mind blown!
-[giggles] -Guys, I don't think it did. Look.
-Bummer. -Phooey.
Things don't always work out on the first try.
translation.fr: Il faut parfois plus d'un essai.

translation.en: But you programmed it with so much speed.
translation.fr: Mais la vitesse était très élevée.

translation.en: We can brainstorm new ideas.
No, this has to work. What travels faster than the speed of light?
translation.fr:
Non. Qu'est-ce qui va plus vite
que la lumière ?

translation.en: Think, Benny, think!
Ooh! Maybe sound!
-I'm not sure if that's true. -It's gonna work. It just has to.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas sûre. Ça va marcher. Il le faut.

translation.en: -Okay… -Let's fire it up!
-[sighs] -It's okay, Benny. Even the best scientists in the world haven't cracked the teleportation code.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est rien. Personne n'a déchiffré
le code de la téléportation.

translation.en: Code! I just need the right code!
translation.fr: Oui ! Il me faut le bon code !

translation.en: -[Rosie] Yikes! -[Ada] Oh, no!
-[Ada gasps] -I'm so sorry!
You tried to help, let me use your lab and everything,
translation.fr:
Tu m'as aidé, prêté ton labo
et j'ai fait sauter le courant.

translation.en: and I knocked out the power. And I'm still not going back home.
translation.fr:
Tu m'as aidé, prêté ton labo
et j'ai fait sauter le courant. Je ne rentrerai pas chez moi.

translation.en: -Sorry, Benny. -[barks] I crossed my fingers and toes that it would work.
translation.fr:
Désolé. J'avais croisé
les doigts et les orteils.

translation.en: It might've been a flop, but you didn't stop.
translation.fr:
Malgré l'échec,
tu n'as pas baissé les bras.

translation.en: You've got grit, B.
We didn't figure out how to teleport you home, but I have a theory.
translation.fr:
On n'a pas réussi à te téléporter,
mais j'ai une théorie.

translation.en: Maybe making new friends can cure your homesickness.
translation.fr: Te faire des amis te soulagera.

translation.en: Come on, watch Comet Quest with us.
[all] "We don't rest until we quest!"
That was the business! 'Night, kids.
Another out-of-this-world episode! I'm gonna see what Dre thought.
translation.fr:
C'était incroyable.
Je vais en parler avec Dre.

translation.en: I found a way to stay close.
You were right. It was time for a new idea. Bam!
translation.fr: Tu avais raison. J'ai changé d'idée.

translation.en: Ham radio!
I can use it to talk to Dre from anywhere.
translation.fr: Je peux parler à Dre de n'importe où.

translation.en: The signal's so strong that you can even bounce it off of the moon.
translation.fr: Le signal peut même atteindre la lune.

translation.en: [Rosie] Fab-tastic!
Luckily, Dre doesn't live that far away.
translation.fr: Dre ne vit pas aussi loin.

translation.en: Dre, it's me!
[Dre] B, can you believe Doctor Galactic finally made it to all the moons around Jupiter?
translation.fr:
Benny, le Dr Galactique est allé
sur toutes les lunes de Jupiter.

translation.en: Next level, right?
Say hi to my new friends, Ada, Iggy, and Rosie.
translation.fr:
Dis bonjour à mes amis,
Ada, Iggy et Rosie.

translation.en: -Howdy. -Hi.
-[Dre] Hey. -I miss you so much!
But at least we can talk all the time with this.
translation.fr: Mais on se parlera comme ça.

translation.en: Me too, but I'm glad you have new friends. I can't wait to meet them.
translation.fr:
Tu me manques aussi.
J'ai hâte de rencontrer tes amis.

translation.en: -Love you, cuz. -Love you, B.
Call you tomorrow.
Aw! Your cousin seems awesome. Just like you.
translation.fr: Ton cousin a l'air génial. Comme toi.

translation.en: We're happy you're not an evil unicorn bot that loves music.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas un robot licorne diabolique.

translation.en: Huh! I'm definitely not.
But an evil, music-loving unicorn bot sounds wicked.
translation.fr:
Mais un robot licorne diabolique,
ça a l'air génial.

translation.en: Adding that to my list of ideas for comic book villains.
translation.fr:
Je vais l'ajouter
à ma liste d'idées de méchants.

translation.en: According to my calculations, this is gonna be the start of a beautiful friendship.
translation.fr:
D'après mes calculs,
ceci est le début d'une belle amitié.

translation.en: -Yeah! -[all laugh]
